solution_line_template: This week, Amanda added {ordered_this_week} notebooks - {lost_this_week} notebooks = <<{ordered_this_week}-{lost_this_week}={net_change_this_week}>>{net_change_this_week} notebooks.
Now, Amanda has {initial_notebooks} notebooks + {net_change_this_week} notebooks = <<{initial_notebooks}+{net_change_this_week}={final_notebooks}>>{final_notebooks} notebooks.
